page.title: 14CALLINGTON POLICE STATION
page.content: The{police station}stands on the site of the old primary school at the crossroads of the A390 and A388. It is small,comprising a reception area with offices to the rear. Callington is an out station of the{sub division}of {Liskeard}which is under the authority of{Launceston.}The station is open daily from 10am to 11am and 7pm to 8pm for enquiries,reports and complaints,renewal of gun licences and presentation of vehicle documents. The{sergeant in charge}is responsible for the town and its environs for approx.a 5 mile radius. Under him is a{community PC}who is expected to take part in the life of the town and build up a mutual trust and co-operation with people. {Four patrol car {officers}are also based at Callington and the Gunnislake community officer also comes under the sergeant's area.
